original_text:
I broke the fangs of the unrighteous
    and made him drop his prey from his teeth.
korean_text: 불의한 자의 턱뼈를 부수고 노획한 물건을 그 잇새에서 빼내었느니라

sentences.original_text: I broke the fangs of the unrighteous
and made him drop his prey from his teeth.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 이에서 먹이를 떨어뜨리게 했다
